elements.text: This past week, you've consistently lost track of things, such as your keys and wallet. You've had some recent stressors in your life, and losing track of your things makes you even more anxious. You know that stress can worsen memory, and your memory will probably improve when things are...

elements.name: Lost Things_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
